item.title: 14 Tips for Quick and Effective Travel Photography - farbspiel photography
item.description:
14 Tips for Quick and Effective Travel Photography - farbspiel photography

Travel photography can be tough, especially if you have little time. Read my 14 tips for mastering this challenge and get high-quality results.

item.title: Touring the World? Don't Miss These Beauties - Women Travel The World
item.description:
Touring the World? Don't Miss These Beauties - Women Travel The World

Maybe it's your gap year, or maybe you're having your midlife crisis in style, but whatever the reason, you're touring the world and so good on you! I'm sure you're going to see the Eiffel Tower, The Empire State Building, Ayers Rock, Big Ben, The Taj Mahal and all that.

item.title: what i've learned from travel | Well-Traveled Wife
item.description:
what i've learned from travel | Well-Traveled Wife

i've learned about new cultures, food, art, music, clothing, dance, and beliefs. i've learned about beautiful differences in the way people live around the world. i've learned patience. so much patience. (i don't always practice it, but i've learned it ;) i've learned how to read a map, how to retrace my steps, and how to be confident in a new place.

item.title: 8 Nifty Little Items You Never Pack...But Should
item.description: 8 Nifty Little Items You Never Pack...But Should

item.title: 10 Things Not to Do When Traveling as a Couple
item.description:
10 Things Not to Do When Traveling as a Couple

As a couple, my husband and I have traveled quite a bit. We also work remotely as freelancers which means neither of us takes off to an office during the day. Needless to say, over the time we've been in a relationship, we've spent a lot of time together and often in very close quarters.

item.title: Glamping: A wimp's guide to luxury camping
item.description:
Glamping: A wimp's guide to luxury camping

'Glamping', or 'camping for softies', has firmly pitched its way into the travel mainstream in the last few years. The act of glamping is perfect for precious people like me who want to experience the glory of the great outdoors but don't want to crap in a ditch.

item.title: PHOTOGRAPHY DAY: Why you should visit Indonesia in 15 Pictures
item.description:
PHOTOGRAPHY DAY: Why you should visit Indonesia in 15 Pictures

WHY EVERYONE SHOULD VISIT INDONESIA I have a confession to make: Cambodia warmed my heart with its incredibly kind, quiet people, but after seeing Indonesia I am totally, utterly in Love with this wild, green, country! Since I started my trip in February, I saw some pretty amazing places, ...

item.title: Top 10 islands in the world - A Luxury Travel Blog
item.description:
Top 10 islands in the world - A Luxury Travel Blog

An island getaway is many people's dream holiday. If you're looking for somewhere special to relax this year, whether you seek stunning scenery, beautiful golden sandy beaches or fine food, then Tripadvisor's recently published top 10 islands in the world might be just what you're looking for to narrow down your options.

item.title: Airbnb Treehouse: World's Most Wish-Listed Listing - A Modern Wayfarer
item.description:
Airbnb Treehouse: World's Most Wish-Listed Listing - A Modern Wayfarer

You've seen the mesmerising pictures plastered all over Instagram, the twinkling lights and suspended peter-pan-like footbridge set amidst lush foliage and pine trees. The romantic Airbnb Treehouse is a real-life fairytale you can visit for a relaxing few days holiday. But where exactly is the world's most "wish-listed" listing, and what's the story behind it?

item.title: How to travel the world with almost no money | Tomislav Perko | TEDxTUHH
item.description:
How to travel the world with almost no money | Tomislav Perko | TEDxTUHH

Many people daydream about traveling the world, but all of them have the same excuse - lack of money. Tomislav, after traveling the world for years with almost no money, shows how it is possible for everyone to do the same, if they really want to.
